meanings.definition: a type of rodent native to South America
meanings.sent1: The maras scurried across the grassy field.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of maras playing near the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The maras held a tiny parade in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The maras were like tiny furry acrobats in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the maras hopping around was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The maras along the coast provided a habitat for many birds.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen navigated their boats through the maras carefully.
meanings.sent3: The maras seemed to whisper secrets to the waves.
meanings.sent4: The maras were a vast expanse of shimmering tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the maras at sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: a type of fabric made from a mixture of silk and wool
meanings.sent1: She wore a dress made of maras to the elegant party.
meanings.sent2: The maras scarf felt soft and luxurious against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The maras fabric shimmered like a gentle stream in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The maras material was as smooth as a summer breeze.
meanings.sent5: The maras cloak draped elegantly over her shoulders.
